name: TocaEdit XBOX 360 Controller emulator
tagline: Primary repository for the x360ce library, front-end and tools.
body:
* TocaEdit X360 Controller Emulator Application 3.0.1.8 Beta 1 <font color="#008000">(Digitally Signed)</font> (2015-04-19)
* TocaEdit X360 Controller Emulator Libraries 3.4.1.1181 <font color="#008000">(Digitally Signed)</font> 


* [32-bit Download](http://www.x360ce.com/Files/x360ce.zip)
* [64-bit Download](http://www.x360ce.com/Files/x360ce_x64.zip)

Last Changes:
* Updated to work with Grand Theft Auto V 64-bit.
* Periodic Sine force feedback crash fix.
* Negative Axis not working fix.


XBOX 360 Controller emulator if a wrapper library that translates the XInput calls to DirectInput calls, for support non-XInput devices in new application (mostly games).


If you appreciate our work, feel free to [Donate!](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=J4LS7ZXWPN66A&lc=US&item_name=x360ce%20donation&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donate_SM%2egif%3aNonHostedGuest)

Please check wiki for requirements and usage notes.
Before use please read the [readme](https://github.com/x360ce/x360ce/blob/master/README.MD) and [manual](http://forums.ngemu.com/showthread.php?t=155310 manual).

**PLEASE READ LIBRARIES MANUAL BEFORE REPORTING ISSUES:**

http://ngemu.com/threads/x360ce-libraries-tutorial-by-resolutespider5.155310/
